name: Incremental Idle Dungeon Crawler
description:
=== DISCLAIMER ===

The language in the game is fully german. Sorry about that. The only thing I can say about that is -> HANS BRING ZE FLAMMENWERFER

p.s. Hope you still can enjoy it!

=== ===

Small incremental game in the Dungeon Crawler theme. You can have some fun with it for 1-2 hours.

Slay monsters by clicking "THE BUTTON" or recruite party members that do the job for you!

Level Up increase your stats !     

Study to increase your knowlege of the arcane power!

Craft powerful relicts to slay even the hardest dungeon floors!
